$SPY Need you $AAPL  and $MSFT  to take care of some business LFG 🚀🚀🚀

$NVDA $TSLA $AMZN $MSFT as much of many of us want to jump in with both feet with what seems like a rally forming, one has to recognize that 80% of yesterdays gains happened premarket with the regular session proving a slight rise to sideways movement. These aren’t the signs of a rally with legs. 

But overall, the rise was based on two things. Hope for productive talks this evening between Russia and Ukraine.  And the consolidation of oil prices. Prices that will do little if anything to change rising gas prices and have any meaningful impact on consumer behavior which is already evolving as we speak. 

Smart money traders are smart and holding back on any conviction moves at this moment. The key is to stay nimble at this moment in time. 

Several big traders have their eyes on Square primarily as a momentum trade. If Thursday sees continued up movement, it may be a stock for a swing movement to 130. If we see a down day, be ready to see 75% of the market liquidate. 

Patience.
